mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, market_qna_no, market_qna_title, member_id,market_qna_question_date from market_qna where market_no=#{market_no} order by market_qna_no desc) where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum <=#{endRow}
select count(*) from market_qna where market_no = #{market_no}
